messages.content: That's a maryland fan comment. You should be ashamed of yourself.
Weird, I checked again and it works for me now. It wasn't the first few times I tried to click.
She does it again in last nights episode, it’s so shady!!
I used to do shit like this...back when I had a serious drinking problem I was in denial about
I've always wanted one of those but like worry it'll make a huge mess in my washer
Same, ASMR is nightmarish. My skin crawls just thinking about it.
This is **NUTS**!!! I still use both of these on my boyfriend, who thankfully watched this season with me and also hated [NAME].
That's the laziest bro I've ever seen
Looks like he has a history of being an awful human:
He’s 60 and never had a HC gig. That should worry folks!
If too many medical professionals die then life will be worse as we cannot get medical treatment
Ok shady flags are flapping so hard I was knocked out of my chair.
